divs: Sighting DetailsMy family and I went outside and saw bright lights in the sky. But the object was just hovering and not moving like other planes in the sky. We got our binoculars and telescope and got a close up of the object. And it was disc shaped with bright, red, green, yellow lights circling around the edge of it; it looked like. We saw it the past two nights in a row around the same time. It is in the western sky of long island. If anyone else saw this object. Please post it. Thank you.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Farmingville
There were no other sightings in Farmingville on or around September 15th 2007
